bug.author: JoanFM
bug.summary: Executor logger does not get parameters from Pea (no log_sse can be activated for Executors)
bug.description:
Describe the bug Since logger in Executor is instantiated by just giving the name as parameter, it can't receive log_sse parameter and therefore will never pass the logs to be processed by the Dashboard. Solutions possible:
Proper forwarding the parameter. Access Pea's logger from the Drivers logger (which is a property accessing the pea's)
